name: Endless Ski
description:
Rediscover the 90s classic Ski Free, re-imagined in Unreal Engine

Updated to support Unreal Engine 5!



The player controls a skier on a mountain slope, avoiding obstacles, performing stunts, and avoiding that Yeti!

Features

  • Exciting snow landscape adventure
  • Perfect game for all ages!
  • Dodge the dog. Dodge the snowboarder. But most importantly dodge that Yeti!
  • Ski through flags to gain the points
  • The longer you ski, the greater the score!
  • Fun atmospheric music to listen to
